verses.kjv: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
verses.ct: Praise the LORD! Praise God in his sanctuary; praise him in the mighty expanse of his power.

verses.kjv: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
verses.ct: Praise him for his powerful deeds; praise him for his surpassing greatness.

verses.kjv: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
verses.ct: Praise him with the blast of the trumpet; praise him with harps and lyres.

verses.kjv: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
verses.ct: Praise him with tambourines and dancing; praise him with stringed instruments and flutes.

verses.kjv: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
verses.ct: Praise him with crashing cymbals; praise him with resounding cymbals.

verses.kjv: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
verses.ct: Let everything that has breath praise the LORD. Praise the LORD!
